name: Venom Viper
text:
1 Reptile monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can discard 1 Reptile monster; Add 1 "Venom" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is the only monster you control: You can Special Summon 1 "Venom" monster from your hand. You cannot Special Summon  monsters the turn you activate this effect except "Venom" monsters. Once per turn, if your opponent Summons a monster(s) while this card points to a "Venom" monster (Quick Effect): Place a Venom counter on that monster(s).
